subject: Follow-up: Franecki and Sons performance report
body:
Dear Thomas,

Good to connect with you last week.

I'm following up on the performance report. We require an update by EOD tomorrow for our trustees.

Could you please provide a status update?

Kind regards,
Michael Jones

--
Michael Jones
Portfolio Manager
National Provident Fund
Wellington, New Zealand

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for Sunsuper
body:
Thomas,

Client instruction just came down. We need to hedge our exposure to the USD exposure.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

--
Sarah Connor
Managing Director, Portfolio Manager
J.P. Morgan Asset Management
Sydney, Australia
Tel: +61 2 9003 8888

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for Sunsuper
body:

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor
